author: kpedro88
body:
#### PR description:

backport of #42514 and #42597

(The backport was actually performed starting from the commits in #42648, which is "closer" to 12_4_X and therefore required repeating fewer changes.)

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. FastSim DIGI-RECO workflow tested and found to have reduced memory usage (from 8358 MB down to 4677 MB in a 4-thread job w/ PU 0-120).

attn: @cms-sw/ppd-l2 @cms-sw/pdmv-l2 this should solve the excessive memory usage observed in the FastSim 2022 campaign. This change was already backported through the 13_X_Y release cycles when it was originally introduced, so campaigns for 2023 onward should not encounter the same problem.
title: Moved creating SiPixelTemplateStore from DB to an ESProducer [12_4]
